review:
Pros:
**** ************* 
Helped me conceived naturally with PCOS
***** *** ***** ******** * ***** ***** * ***** ******* ** *** ***** **** 
Warns you for any emergency in advance 
Scolds you for right things in advance - weight gain n sugar in my case
Updated with latest medicines n treatments in market 
Hard to find such an experienced *** ************* ****** ** **** ***** ***
Friendly and frank

Cons:
Biggest con is that I was showing her at fortis Gurgaon n after 2 trimesters she told me that she won't b available during delivery as she is based out of Delhi. I didn't see any point in showing a gynea when she isn't available during delivery 

In last trimester I changed my doctor.  

A little moody especially during rush hours she rushes through

I started consulting Dr. Aneja in my third trimester.
She diagnosed my gestational diabetes in my 7.5 month of pregnancy.
This was discovered on her gut when she told me to do my sugar test again.
She helped get an appointment from the best Urologist so that my case would be personally looked after by the top specialist. It was impossible to get an appointment without her involvement.
Inspite of my condition she pushed me to have a normal delivery and then when I had to be rushed for an emergency c-sec because they baby went into distress she took care & handled it smoothly. Next morning of the operation I was up and about and had no discomfort or complications.
I highly recommend her.

context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review: I visited Dr. Anjila Aneja for my pregnancy consultation. She seemed friendly and frank in the beginning. But in my continuous visit she stopped paying attention to my concerns. Also because of her big stature she could barely bend down for half-a-sec to check my baby's heart beat, and I started doubting how she would perform the delivery or would she even care to handle it herself. Hence I decided to switch my doctor in the final trimester.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very bad experience. They need a lot of improvement. Unprofessional doctors and consultation fee charged was 1500 while mentioned was 1200

Super professional, incredibly ************* and most of all the first gynae who did not treat me as a 20-something first time pregnant newly married girl, and which I most certainly was not. I am a working professional in my 30s and very much capable of discussing and understanding challenges with pregnancy, risks etc. I really wanted to meet someone who would treat me professionally and with whom I could discuss everything that was bothering me. And Dr. Aneja is amazing at that! Thank you so much for professionally guiding me all throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is an Amazing doctor and helping me survive through the toughest pregnancy. Carrying twins with so many complications wasn’t easy but she  gave me the hope and made me stay positive throughout. I am grateful to the hands that helped bring my babies into this world.

I was in the doctors cabin at the exact time of my appointment which explains that the hospital is keeping up the promise related to time. The doctor was very nice and queried about various things. It was a satisfying visit and I am looking forward for the upcoming visits.

I(Tabassum) started consulting dr Anjila Aneja in my first trimester when my regular doctor told me that u have low placenta and u should take complete bed rest I was afraid that time ,then we go to dr anjila Aneja she told me that u don't have to worry and she started consulting.Now I have cute 9 months old baby girl through normal vaginal delivery. 
I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ******* ***** **** *** ******* *** ******* *** **** **** *** ************* ** *** ****** **** ** ************** ** *** *** ** ******** *** ** **** *********** *** ***** ** * **** ********* ***** The treatment she gave *** ********** ***** *** she barely explained any procedure. When asked for the second time, she gets agitated and rude.
She should really try to make her patients feel comfortable.
*** ** ********** Very professional and competent, and also very caring. I would highly recommend her.
